scenario.title: Check that solution returns the correct coeffient for a valid input of dishes when dishes are removed

examples.step: Given a collection representing the value of each dish '<list1>'
When i remove dishes from the collection '<removedDishes>' to evaluate the coeffient
Then the coeffient of the list with removed values should be equals to '<coeffient1>'
Given a collection representing the value of each dish '[-1,-9,0,5,-7]'
When i remove dishes from the collection '[-9,-7]' to evaluate the coeffient
Then the coeffient of the list with removed values should be equals to '14'
